title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees in thousands, with a total of 7 data points.
Overall Number of employees in thousands has decreased over the Year
Number of employees in thousands is roughly constant from 2012 to 2018.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max Number of employees in thousands about 140.0 was recorded at Year 2015
Min Number of employees in thousands about 129.0 was recorded at Year 2018
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees in thousands, with a total of 7 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2018.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2012 to 2014.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2015.
